quote: This is just the way life is – sometimes cruel, sometimes beautiful, all the time confusing and frightening and exhilarating – and we just have to deal with it. That’swhat freedom is.
quote_letters: THIS IS JUST THE WAY LIFE IS - SOMETIMES CRUEL SOMETIMES BEAUTIFUL ALL THE TIME CONFUSING AND FRIGHTENING AND EXHILARATING - AND WE JUST HAVE TO DEAL WITH IT THATSWHAT FREEDOM IS
